query:
UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Marketing receives user-generated vacation photos from customers and partners that require manual editing before use in campaigns (background removal, lighting adjustment, resolution upscaling). Design team spends 3-4 hours/week on basic photo editing tasks. Photo quality inconsistencies across marketing materials. Slow turnaround (2-3 days) for incorporating customer photos into campaigns.',
  aiApproach = 'Subscribe to AI image enhancement SaaS tool (e.g., Topaz Labs, Luminar AI, or Remove.bg) that automatically removes backgrounds, adjusts lighting/color, upscales resolution, and applies brand-consistent filters. Simple drag-and-drop interface with batch processing. Minimal setup—just tool subscription and brief team training.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Manual editing: Receive customer photo → designer opens Photoshop → remove background → adjust lighting → upscale resolution → apply brand filter. 20-30 min per photo.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'AI-assisted editing: Upload photo to AI tool → automatic background removal, lighting adjustment, upscaling → designer reviews and approves → export. 5 min per photo.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Reduces photo editing bottleneck, enables faster campaign turnaround, improves photo quality consistency',
  processOwner = 'Creative Director',
  affectedTeams = '["Creative Team", "Social Media", "Content Marketing"]',
  primaryMetric = 'time_savings',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce photo editing time by 75% (from 4 hours/week to 1 hour/week)',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 4 hours/week for 8-10 photos = 25 min/photo',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve 5 min/photo average, maintain design quality standards, process 20+ photos/week',
  measurementMethod = 'Track time spent on photo editing tasks, count of photos processed per week'
WHERE title = 'AI Image Enhancement for Marketing Materials';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user oYC4Lz5DqbQiGEf.root --database LVN2BBaghCkJZKnQ9H5R4v --execute UPDATE initiatives 
SET 
  problemStatement = 'Marketing receives user-generated vacation photos from customers and partners that require manual editing before use in campaigns (background removal, lighting adjustment, resolution upscaling). Simple drag-and-drop interface with batch processing. Minimal setup—just tool subscription and brief team training.',
  currentWorkflow = 'Manual editing: Receive customer photo → designer opens Photoshop → remove background → adjust lighting → upscale resolution → apply brand filter. 20-30 min per photo.',
  proposedWorkflow = 'AI-assisted editing: Upload photo to AI tool → automatic background removal, lighting adjustment, upscaling → designer reviews and approves → export. 5 min per photo.',
  bottlenecksAddressed = 'Reduces photo editing bottleneck, enables faster campaign turnaround, improves photo quality consistency',
  processOwner = 'Creative Director',
  affectedTeams = '["Creative Team", "Social Media", "Content Marketing"]',
  primaryMetric = 'time_savings',
  quantifiedGoal = 'Reduce photo editing time by 75% (from 4 hours/week to 1 hour/week)',
  baselineMeasurement = 'Current: 4 hours/week for 8-10 photos = 25 min/photo',
  successCriteria = 'Achieve 5 min/photo average, maintain design quality standards, process 20+ photos/week',

WHERE title = 'AI Image Enhancement for Marketing Materials';
